  ## API Spec
  Update Convo Detail
Authorizations:
HTTPBearer
path Parameters
convo_id
required
string (Convo Id)
Request Body schema: application/json
name
Name (string) or Name (null) (Name)
knowledgeBase
Array of Knowledgebase (strings) or Knowledgebase (null) (Knowledgebase)
enableAutoResponse
Enableautoresponse (boolean) or Enableautoresponse (null) (Enableautoresponse)
knowledgeBaseDestinationInsight
Array of Knowledgebasedestinationinsight (strings) or Knowledgebasedestinationinsight (null) (Knowledgebasedestinationinsight)
enableWebSearch
Enablewebsearch (boolean) or Enablewebsearch (null) (Enablewebsearch)
webSearchType
WebSearchType (string) or null
webSearchConfig
WebSearchConfig (object) or null
enableReranker
Enablereranker (boolean) or Enablereranker (null) (Enablereranker)
enableAgentRetrieval
Enableagentretrieval (boolean) or Enableagentretrieval (null) (Enableagentretrieval)
model
AIModel (string) or ImageGenerationModel (string) or Model (null) (Model)
enableGenerateImage
Enablegenerateimage (boolean) or Enablegenerateimage (null) (Enablegenerateimage)
lengthPreset
LengthType (string) or null
chatMode
ChatMode (string) or null
